Pages.Name: logic_scene_list_manager
Pages.Description: Manages a list of logic_choreographed_scene entities. Store choreo scenes in them in order that they will be played by other inputs. Whenever a scene plays, the manager will remove all scenes before that one in the list. The name of another logic_scene_list_manager can be entered in a slot instead of an invididual scene, which will cause all scenes in that manager to be removed when a later scene in this list is played.

Properties.Description: The name of a logic_choreographed_scene, or logic_scene_list_manager.

InputOutputs.Name: Shutdown
InputOutputs.Description: Remove the manager and all scenes referenced by it (and all scenes referenced by logic_scene_list_manager's embedded in this one).
